Header: “Anna” scheduled to be released this month
Content: “Anna” is an upcoming English-language French crime action thriller film written, produced and directed by Luc Besson. The film stars Sasha Luss as the title character, with Luke Evans, Cillian Murphy and Helen Mirren also starring. Beneath Anna Poliatova’s striking beauty lies a secret that will unleash her indelible strength and skill to become one of the world’s most feared government assassins. It is scheduled to be released on 21st of this month by Summit Entertainment.
